casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Charles Edward MALLOY. No. 419P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. John G. Barnwell, Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney Generals, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 18th day of February 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
